dcterms:description: Flow is a modular learning framework for mixed autonomy traffic, facilitating the simulation and training of reinforcement learning models for traffic-based scenarios.

dcterms:description: SUMO is a multi-modal, microscopic traffic simulation package used for simulating urban mobility scenarios.

dcterms:description: CARLA is an open-source urban driving simulator designed for autonomous vehicle research, providing a flexible API and scalability for various simulation scenarios.

dcterms:description: The Intelligent Driver Model (IDM) simulates human-like driving behavior in traffic, particularly in congested states.
dcterms:title: Intelligent Driver Model (IDM)
